name: AzDOCosmosDBUpload
description: When provided a file path to a supported file type in the repository, upload the contents to a Cosmos DB instance
author: Microsoft Corporation
instanceNameFormat: Upload a JSON file to CosmosDB

inputs.name: cosmosEndpointName
inputs.label: Endpoint Variable Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the variable that contains the URI for the Cosmos instance, as found 'Keys,' and stored in a variable group

inputs.name: cosmosKeyName
inputs.label: Primary Key Variable Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the variable that contains the primary key for the Cosmos instance, as found 'Keys,' and stored in a variable group

inputs.name: cosmosDatabase
inputs.label: Database Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The database to which you will connect. If it does not exist, it will be created

inputs.name: cosmosContainer
inputs.label: Container Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The container within the database to which you will connect. If it does not exist, it will be created

inputs.name: cosmosPartition
inputs.label: Partition Key
inputs.helpMarkDown: The partition key for the container. If one is not provided Cosmos will default to something

inputs.name: fileLocation
inputs.label: File path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path of the script to execute. Must be a fully qualified path or relative to `$(System.DefaultWorkingDirectory)`.
